item.title: Gist doesn't show up in Hugo
item.description: When I updated the version of Hugo, I no longer see the following Gist page. <script src="https://gist.github.com/takoikatakotako/5aba51305d74c009a2c878897837e006.js"></script> It worked by rewriting it as follows. Reference: Shortcodes
